column2: # Mixed is just a wrapper for lmer to get p-values from parametric bootstrapping #but set to method "LRT" and remove "args_test" to quick check ##model = mixed(formula, data = PIT.clean, method = "LRT", control = control, REML = FALSE); model
model = mixed(formula, data = PIT.clean, method = "PB", control = control, REML = FALSE, args_test = list(nsim = 50, cl=cl))
Formula (the first argument) converted to formula.
Due to missing values, reduced number of observations to 2490
ref_grid(model)  #triple check everything is centered at 0
mod <- lmer(formula, data = PIT.clean, control = control, REML = T) # recompute model with REML = T now for further analysis
